com.me.tiledMapGame.pathing

Class ObjectGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.me.tiledMapGame.pathing.ObjectGrid

  • public class ObjectGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains multiple GridLayers and a list of all entities.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObjectGrid(int length, int width) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGridLayer()
      Creates a new initialized (but empty) GridLayer and adds it to the end of ArrayList<GridLayer> GridLayers.
      void clearAllVisited()
      Calls clearVisited(int li) for all layers in GridLayers.
      void clearVisited(int li)
      Marks all nodes in the grid as unvisited for the layer indicated by li; this MUST be called before running PathFinder.find_path() again.
      java.util.List<com.me.tiledMapGame.entities.Entity> entityList() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addGridLayer

        public void addGridLayer()
        Creates a new initialized (but empty) GridLayer and adds it to the end of ArrayList<GridLayer> GridLayers.

      • clearVisited

        public void clearVisited(int li)
        Marks all nodes in the grid as unvisited for the layer indicated by li; this MUST be called before running PathFinder.find_path() again.
        Parameters:
        li - index for the layer to be cleared

      • clearAllVisited

        public void clearAllVisited()
        Calls clearVisited(int li) for all layers in GridLayers.

      • entityList

        public java.util.List<com.me.tiledMapGame.entities.Entity> entityList()
